COMMENT_TX: ej,belct001,P,welkt901,Fighting ej,hincb001,P,welkt901,Intentional HBP ej,greet003,P,welkt901,Charging mound $Todd Greene charged the mound; he and Brett Hinchliffe exchanged punches; both players and Tim Belcher (not in game were ejected by HP umpire Tim Welke
ej,sandr002,P,morrd901,Balls and strikes (Threw gum on field) $Sanders ejected by 1B umpire Morrison for arguing balls and strikes after striking out; he threw a bucket of gum on the field

$after lead-off hitter Orlando Palmeiro was called out on strikes and dropped his bat at the plate, HP umpire Tim Tschida thought it was an act of defiance and ejected Palmeiro; however, Angels hitting coach Rod Carew had instructed his starting lineup to each use the same bat, so Palmeiro was simply leaving the bat behind for Gary DiSarcina; after DiSarcina and manager Terry Collins convinced Tschida that Palmeiro was not trying to show him up, the umpire rescinded the ejection
ej,bowal001,C,younl901,Balls and strikes $Angels coach Bowa ejected by HP umpire Young for arguing balls and strikes while Glaus at bat

$the last pitch by Wilson Alvarez was a fast ball that struck HP umpire John Shulock on the mask; Shulock walked toward the mound and started arguing with Alvarez; catcher Mike DiFelice tried to get between them and Shulock bumped DiFelice; Shulock thought Alvarez and DiFelice intentionallty hit Shulock, who was fined and suspended for three games for his actions
